<!-- KNITR_ASIS_OUTPUT_TOKEN -->
<!-- rnb-source-begin  -->

```r
pedsDf %>%
  dplyr::select(Sample,sample_location,OTU,Abundance) %>%
  group_by(Sample) %>% 
  mutate(N = sum(Abundance)) %>%
  ungroup() %>%
  filter(N >= 1100) %>%
  dplyr::select(-N) %>%
  pivot_wider(names_from = \OTU\"
